column4: Hi every one, I was just wondering if there was any news about the ati proprietary drivers and ubuntu 10.04??
I saw a web page yesterday that showed a fix for it... something about fixing the splash
fixing the splash? don't know what this is...
well its the new one ubuntu switched to
ok, so from Radeon to Splash?
oh I found it but all it does is fix the ugly splash screen when you install the graphics driver
I don't have any problem with that
it was awful on my son's toshiba satellite so I disabled the ati radeon driver
plus the driver just didn't seen to be working right
all the apps worked fine tho
I mean all the driver apps
Yeah well... don't know about that :D
btw Did you tried my link about the ati?
